title: Artificial Intelligence Concepts
demo_description: An overview of Artificial Intelligence (AI), its relationship with Machine Learning and Deep Learning, key subfields, and core concepts.

title: AI Tools in Development
demo_description: Exploring the benefits and pitfalls of using AI code assistants like Copilot and ChatGPT in ML/DS development, emphasizing responsible use.

title: Colour Theme Switcher Demo
demo_description: Demonstration of dynamic theme switching using CSS and JavaScript.

title: Data Engineering Concepts
demo_description: Learn about Data Engineering principles, practices, tools, and its crucial role in supporting Data Science and Machine Learning.

title: Security in ML AI & Data Science
demo_description: Understanding key security risks and considerations in machine learning, AI, and data science, including data privacy, model security, and infrastructure protection.

title: Deploying Django to AWS Elastic Beanstalk
demo_description: A step-by-step guide on deploying Django applications to AWS Elastic Beanstalk using the EB CLI, covering configuration, deployment, and troubleshooting.

title: Deploying Django to Google App Engine
demo_description: Guide on deploying Django applications to Google App Engine (GAE) Standard Environment using the gcloud CLI.

title: Deploying Django to Heroku
demo_description: Step-by-step guide for deploying Django applications to the Heroku platform using the Heroku CLI.

title: Deploying Django to PythonAnywhere
demo_description: Step-by-step guide for deploying Django applications to PythonAnywhere.com.

title: Deploying Django to Render
demo_description: Step-by-step guide for deploying Django applications to the Render platform.

title: Comparison: Django Deployment Platforms
demo_description: Comparing Heroku, Render, PythonAnywhere, Google App Engine, and AWS Elastic Beanstalk for Django deployment.

title: Overview: Django Deployment Options
demo_description: Exploring different options (PaaS, IaaS, FaaS, Containers) for deploying Django web applications.

title: DevOps & MLOps Concepts
demo_description: Learn about DevOps principles and how they apply to Machine Learning (MLOps) for efficient AI development and deployment.

title: Key Django Concepts
demo_description: Learn about key Django framework features.

title: Django Security Features
demo_description: Learn about Django's built-in security features like CSRF protection, XSS prevention, and SQL injection defense.

title: Django Testing Explained
demo_description: Learn about Django's testing framework, including model, view, and form testing.

title: DRF Concepts
demo_description: Learn about key concepts in Django REST Framework (DRF) for building Web APIs, especially for ML/AI applications.

title: Ethical Hacking in AI/ML
demo_description: Learn about applying ethical hacking principles and an adversarial mindset to enhance the security of Machine Learning and AI systems.

title: Feature Engineering Concepts
demo_description: Learn about Feature Engineering techniques used to improve Machine Learning model performance by transforming raw data into informative features.

title: Flask for Machine Learning APIs
demo_description: Learn how Flask, a Python microframework, is used for creating simple Machine Learning APIs. Includes a conceptual code example.

title: Generative AI Concepts
demo_description: Learn about Generative AI, including how it works, its applications in text, image, and code generation, and its role in modern AI.

title: Go (Golang) in ML/AI
demo_description: Learn about Go (Golang) and its applications in Machine Learning and Data Science infrastructure, focusing on concurrency and performance.

title: Java in ML/AI
demo_description: Learn about Java's role in the Machine Learning and Data Science ecosystem, including Big Data (Spark, Hadoop) and enterprise AI systems.

title: Jupyter Notebooks in ML/DS
demo_description: Learn about Jupyter Notebooks and their importance for interactive computing in Data Science and Machine Learning workflows.

title: Kotlin in AI & Android
demo_description: Learn about Kotlin, its features, and its role in Android app development, especially for on-device AI with TensorFlow Lite.

title: Languages for ML/AI & Data Science
demo_description: A comparison of Python, R, SQL, Scala, Java, C++, and other programming languages for Machine Learning, AI, and Data Science workflows.

title: OOP Concepts for ML/DS
demo_description: Understanding Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles in Python and their application in Data Science and Machine Learning libraries.

title: PySpark Concepts
demo_description: Learn about PySpark, the Python API for Apache Spark, used for large-scale data processing and distributed machine learning.

title: Python Concepts Demo
demo_description: Interactive examples of core Python concepts like lists, dictionaries, loops, and functions, relevant to data science and machine learning.

title: PyTorch Concepts
demo_description: Learn about core PyTorch concepts for deep learning, including Tensors, Autograd, nn.Module, and training loops.

title: R Concepts for Data Science
demo_description: Learn about core R language concepts, data structures (vectors, data frames), and key packages like dplyr and ggplot2 for statistical computing and data science.

title: Ruby & Rails in ML/AI
demo_description: Learn about Ruby and the Ruby on Rails framework and how they typically integrate with external Machine Learning services via APIs.

title: Scala Concepts for Big Data & ML
demo_description: Learn about the Scala programming language, its functional features, JVM integration, and its key role in Apache Spark for Big Data and Machine Learning.

title: EV Charging Load Prediction with PyTorch
demo_description: Learn about ev charging load prediction with PyTorch

title: Machine Translation using Seq2Seq
demo_description: Learn about machine translation, using seq2seq and keras

title: AB Testing Shoefly Demo
demo_description: Learn about ab testing, with the shoefly demo

title: Pyspark Wikipedia Clickstream Analysis
demo_description: Learn wikepedia clickstream analysis with pyspark.
